title: Application Not Responding
body:
I just downloaded League of Legends, the application opened and i was able to sign in and download the actual game which took a few hours. After the application closed I tried opening it again to play, but every time i try to open it wont, and it says the application wont open?

I was really excited to play the game but It wont respond and its super annoying! Im not sure if this is something that someone can help with but if you know anything about his problem, please help!!

Thank you!

replies.body:
Typically that type of error is something going on with the installation of the program or somehow your OS might be blocking the program from working correctly. I would probably start by making sure your [**permissions are setup correctly**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) but I'd also want you to try a quick repair if you can. 

If you can't get to that repair, try grabbing the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and running a clean reinstall for a fresh copy of the game.
